#setup for getting the rates per site
```{r}
  library(tidyverse)
  setwd("C:/Users/aurao/Desktop/Bio480/")
  df <- read.table("bb_a24_added.rate", skip = 8, header = T)
  glimpse(df)
  summary(df)
  ggplot(df, aes(x = Site, y = Rate)) + geom_line()
```
